sections.text:
CORRECTION
Zhiguang Zhou • Huihui Li • Fang Liu • Yanan Liu • Chaogeng Huang • Yubo Tao • Hai Lin • Weihua Su
Correction: Visual analytics of economic features for multivariate spatio-temporal GDP data
Published online: 27 July 2023 The Visualization Society of Japan 2023
Correction to: J Vis (2018) 21:337–350 https://doi.org/10.1007/s12650-017-0449-z Unfortunately, Figs. 1, 2, 5, 6 and 7 are published incorrectly in the print published article. Now, the correct figures are given below.
The original article can be found online at https://doi.org/10.1007/s12650-017-0449-z.
Z. Zhou H. Li F. Liu Y. Liu C. Huang School of Information, Zhejiang University of Finance and Economics, Hangzhou, China
Z. Zhou Y. Tao H. Lin State Key Lab of CAD and CG, Zhejiang University, Hangzhou, China
W. Su (&) Statistics and Mathematics Institute, Zhejiang Gongshang University, Hangzhou, China E-mail: swh@zufe.edu.cn
J Vis (2023) 26:1207–1209 https://doi.org/10.1007/s12650-023-00938-y
The original article has been corrected.
Publisher’s Note Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.

title: Correction: Visual analytics of economic features for multivariate spatio-temporal GDP data
